com.upgrad.bde.assignment.datastructure

Class EVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upgrad.bde.assignment.datastructure.EVM

  • public class EVM
extends java.lang.Object
    The EVM class is an ADT (Abstract Data Type) for storing the EVM (Electronic Voting Machine) records.

    This ADT is used for both Direct Addressing and Hash Table implementations.

    It hosts 02 data elements voter_id and candidate_id for storing EVM records.

    It hosts public getter and setter methods for the data elements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EVM

        public EVM(int voter_id,
           short candidate_id)
        The constructor constructs an object of type EVM by setting values for voter_id and candidate_id .
        Parameters:
        voter_id - is a 6 digit number of type int which acts as the Key for the record.
        candidate_id - is a 3 digit number of type short which acts as the Value of the record.
